appearances.title: American Pulse : CNNW : January 7, 2026 1:00am-2:01am PST
appearances.snippet: . >> it started in late july when john james began feeling something wasn't quite right. that sudden weakness caught everyone's attention. almost immediately. >> i started noticing that my legs started to feel very weak and other people that i hung out with, they actually noticed that my eyes were actually red. >> james made the smart decision to get checked out at urgent care for initial tests came back negative, but within hours of that visit, his condition took a terrifying turn. >> i just collapsed on the floor. >> that collapse happened at home as his father desperately tried to get him to the hospital. >> he told me, get up, son, get up. and i said, dad, why me? i can't walk, you know not. but i actually heard a voice telling me that i was going to be okay. >> james was rushed to the icu, where doctors worked around the clock to keep him alive. in the middle of it all, fear set in. >> it's very hard for me. >> what's going through your mind while all this is going on? >> what am i going to live like? >> medical teams soon diagnosed james with a rare neurological dis
